LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop.label: Request Reinforcements
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop.description: Send a reinforcement request to an automated industrial facility in orbit, reinforcements will be dispatched based on the identification code of the transceiver.
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop_Falcon.label: Request Air Support
LanguageData.DMS_CallDrop_Falcon.description: Send a reinforcement request for three Falcons to an automated industrial facility in orbit, reinforcements will be dispatched based on the identification code of the transceiver.
